script:
Why do programmers prefer their IDEs dark? 🌑💻

Because light attracts bugs! 🐜🚫

Our code is like a fine espresso: best served dark and error-free. ☕️🛠

Night mode isn’t just a preference; it’s a survival tactic against the blinding syntax errors. 🕶️🔍

It's where the glow of the monitor becomes the beacon of hope in a sea of bugs. 💡🌊

Coffee fuels our late-night coding sessions, turning despair into deployable solutions. ☕️💥🚀

Plot twist: The real MVP isn't the caffeine; it's the undying love for dark themes. ❤️‍🔥🖥️ 

Keep your coffee strong and your themes dark for the ultimate coding prowess. ☕️🌌👨‍💻

Smash that follow for more secrets from the dimly lit world of developers! 🎮👇
preview: A humorous take on programmers' coffee addiction
